donor_name: Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade  related  Technical Assistance  to LDC's Trust Fund manager
outputs.output_descr: Since the first Diagnostic Trade Integrated Study in 2002, many developments have occurred in the economy and the trade-related sectors of Yemen. This leads to an urgent need for a Diagnostic Trade Integrated Study update in order to reflect a more accurate picture of the current needs and priorities on the trade-related sectors.

project_descr: Support to the Government Public Sector Reform
